title: kingbob1616
author: kingbob1616
content: Hello Bitcointalk Community,Are you passionate about cryptocurrencies and blockchain technology? Are you a great communicator with a knack for providing top-notch customer service? If so, we have an exciting opportunity for you!We are an upcoming crypto company, committed to revolutionizing the digital asset industry. As we gear up for our upcoming launch, we are seeking talented individuals to join our customer service team.Job Requirements:Exceptional communication skills: You must possess excellent verbal and written communication skills to provide clear and concise support to our customers.Crypto knowledge: A solid understanding of cryptocurrencies, the blockchain ecosystem, and how they work is essential. Your expertise will help you address customer inquiries and provide accurate information.Customer-centric mindset: We value our customers above all else. You should genuinely enjoy interacting with people, be patient, empathetic, and able to handle various customer concerns with professionalism.Problem-solving skills: As a member of our customer service team, you will encounter unique challenges. Quick thinking and a solution-oriented approach will be key in providing exceptional support to our customers.Responsibilities:Responding to customer inquiries promptly and professionally via phone call.Resolving customer issues and complaints in a timely and satisfactory manner, escalating as necessary.Why Join Us?Opportunity for growth: As part of our early team, you will have the chance to grow professionally as the company expands, with potential for leadership roles.Competitive compensation: We offer a competitive salary and benefits package, along with performance-based incentives.Supportive team culture: Join a passionate and dedicated team where collaboration and innovation are valued.If you are enthusiastic about cryptocurrencies, possess outstanding communication skills, and are eager to contribute to our vision, we want to hear from you! This is a great opportunity for anyone with these skill sets to make it big and have a place in the crypto ecosystemTo apply, please send a message to me on telegram https://t.me/Jett_Futures or @Jett_Futures (serious inquiries only)

comments.author: bhadz
comments.body: I have an experience in customer service but I don't want to take calls for now. Do you have positions for a chat support or email representative? I wanna be part of a crypto company and use my experience in the past in terms of a CS position. If none, good luck in finding people to fill that position.

comments.body: Have you already got the required number of members for your team? If not then you may let me know and I may assist you as I have a long experience handling customers. I have worked as a customer service representative on several projects as I am a professional freelancer. I hope I will be able to assist you.

comments.author: Lucius
comments.body: As far as I'm concerned, the OP posted this job advertisement very frivolously, because serious people would at least provide the company name, e-mail or LinkedIn, and here we only have a bunch of requirements that the candidate needs to fulfill and Telegram for contact - not at all suspicious, right?

comments.author: coin-investor
comments.body: Why do I feel bad about this project is it because they have these words in their project descriptionQuoterevolutionizing the digital asset industry These are the same words that scammers are using in their platform to hype their project, their standard for applicants is very high, I'm sure many of us here are qualified but does this project are on our standard we don't know OP is not posting anything and this is not good.In an environment where so many dubious and fake projects OP should be transparent and prove that people are not taking part in a dubious project.

comments.author: CryptSafe
comments.body: OP, it is good for you to have called the attention of the platform to what you offer but if after saying all these and yet no clues about your organisation, what confidence do you have in your own organisation to have come this far to creating awareness about it. What you have done shows that you too do not have confidence in your organisation otherwise you could have mentioned the name of your organisation and possibly drop the be website for review as the case maybe. Only then you can get the attention and possible recommendations you deserve but as for this you have done, I think you have tried your best and let the other processes takes it course.
